meanings.definition: To provide (a house, room, etc.) with furniture, carpets, appliances, etc.
meanings.sent1: We will furnish the new apartment with a sofa and a table.
meanings.sent2: She decided to furnish her bedroom with a cozy rug and a bedside lamp.
meanings.sent3: The talking cat asked for a furnished litter box with a tiny couch inside.
meanings.sent4: Her smile furnished the room with warmth and joy.
meanings.sent5: The colorful paintings furnished the white walls beautifully.

meanings.definition: To supply (a person, establishment, etc.) with what is needed, especially to achieve a particular end.
meanings.sent1: The company will furnish the office with new computers and printers.
meanings.sent2: He promised to furnish the team with all the necessary tools for success.
meanings.sent3: The magician asked the audience to furnish him with a deck of cards for his next trick.
meanings.sent4: Her determination furnished her with the strength to overcome any obstacle.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight furnished the plants with the energy they needed to grow.
